content: crewmate supplies abbreviations 1 skein bernat blanket big ball yarn in marshmallow chain chain <1 skein bernat blanket yarn in frosted blue single_crochet single_crochet <1 skein bernat blanket yarn in black half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 6 scrap of bernat baby blanket yarn in sea foam increase increase 6 5 mm / k-10 5 crochet hook decrease decrease poly fil tapestry needle scissors legs & body viewfinder round 1 8 single_crochet in a magic_ring 16 row 1 chain 13 round 2 increase 16 round 2 in second stitch from the hook 11 single_crochet 4 single_crochet in the last stitch round 3 1 single_crochet increase 24 round 3 working on the other side of the chain 11 single_crochet 4 single_crochet in the last stitch place a stitch marker round 4-10 single_crochet 24 round 4 11 single_crochet increase in next 4 stitches 11 single_crochet increase in next 4 stitches finish off first leg make a second but do not finish off now we will join the legs stuff as you go stuffing firmly before closing round 5 12 single_crochet increase single_crochet increase 12 single_crochet increase single_crochet increase round 11 chain 3 and connect to the other leg single_crochet around round 6 single_crochet around change to black round 12-35 single_crochet 51 24 rounds round 7 single_crochet around round 36 15 single_crochet decrease 48 finish off and leave a long tail for sewing round 37 4 single_crochet decrease 40 round 38 3 single_crochet decrease 32 backpack round 39 2 single_crochet decrease 24 row 1 chain 17 round 40 1 single_crochet decrease 16 row 2 in 3rd chain from the hook half_double_crochet across chain 2 and turn round 41 decrease 8 repeat for row 3-8 finish off and weave in the tail single_crochet down the sides of the square decreasing on the two bottom corners to pull in the edges finish off leave a long tail assembly  sew the back pack onto the mid back of the crew mate leaving the top open for hidden treasures  sew a glare into the view finder using the scrap of seafoam yarn sew the viewfinder onto the crew mate stuffing before finishing off  cuddle your crew mate and be sure it is not the imposter it looks a little sus
